oceanliner_functions module

oceanliner_functions.compute_derived_fields(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, DERIVED_VARIABLES)

Check for derived files in {datadir}/derived and compute if the files don’t exist

Parameters

  • RegionName (str) – It can be selected from the list of regions with pre-SWOT llc4320 data

  • datadir (str) – Directory where input model files are stored

  • start_date (datetime) – Starting date for computing derived fields

  • ndays (int) – Number of days from the start date to compute derived fields

  • DERIVED_VARIABLES (str list) – specifies which variables to derive (steric_height and/or vorticity)

Returns

None

Raises

TBD – TBD

oceanliner_functions.download_llc4320_data(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays)

Download the MITgcm LLC4320 data from PODAAC Earthdata website.

Creates a http access for each target file using the setup_earthdata_login_auth function. Checks for existing llc4320 files in ‘datadir’ and downloads them in the datadir if not found.

Parameters

  • RegionName (str) – Can be selected from the list of regions with pre-SWOT llc4320 data

  • datadir (str) – Directory where input model files are stored

  • start_date (datetime) – Starting date for downloading data

  • ndays (int) – Number of days to be downloaded from the start date

Returns

None

Raises

  • FileNotFoundError – If the Earthdata account details entered are incorrect

  • error-skipping this file – If the file already exists

oceanliner_functions.get_survey_track(ds, sampling_details_in)

Calculates the survey indices and track based on the sampling details for the dataset for all days.

Parameters

  • ds (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset) – MITgcm LLC4320 data for all days

  • sampling_details_in (dict) – It includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest.

Returns

Returns the track (lat, lon, depth, time) of the sampling trajectory based on the type of sampling survey_indices (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset): Returns the indices (i, j, k, time) of the sampling trajectory based on the type of sampling sampling_details (dict): Returns the modified sampling_details by filling in the missing parameters with defaults.

Return type

survey_track (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset)

Raises

Sampling strategy is invalid – If a sampling strategy is not specified or different from the available strategies - sim_utcd, glider, sim_mooring, wave_glider, saildrone

oceanliner_functions.great_circle(lon1, lat1, lon2, lat2)

Computes great-circle distance

Args:

Returns:

Raises:

oceanliner_functions.rotate_vector_to_EN(U, V, AngleCS, AngleSN)

Rotate vector to east north direction.

Assumes that AngleCS and AngleSN are already of same dimension as V and U (i.e. already interpolated to cell center)

Parameters

  • U (xarray Dataarray) – Zonal vector component

  • V (array Dataarray) – Meridonal vector component

Returns

Rotated zonal component vN (xarray Dataarray): Rotated meridonial component

Return type

uE (xarray Dataarray)

Raises

FileNotFoundError – If the Earthdata account details entered are incorrect.

Note: adapted from https://github.com/AaronDavidSchneider/cubedsphere/blob/main/cubedsphere/regrid.py

oceanliner_functions.set_defaults(sampling_details)

Calculates the survey indices and track based on the sampling details for the dataset for all days.

Parameters

  • ds (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset) – MITgcm LLC4320 data for all days

  • sampling_details (dict) – It includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest.

Returns

Returns the track (lat, lon, depth, time) of the sampling trajectory based on the type of sampling survey_indices (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset): Returns the indices (i, j, k, time) of the sampling trajectory based on the type of sampling sampling_details (dict): Returns the modified sampling_details by filling in the missing parameters with defaults.

Return type

survey_track (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset)

Raises

Sampling strategy is invalid – If a sampling strategy is not specified or different from the available strategies - sim_utcd, sim_glider, sim_mooring, wave_glider, sail_drone

oceanliner_functions.setup_earthdata_login_auth(endpoint: str = 'urs.earthdata.nasa.gov')

Set up the the Earthdata login authorization for downloading data.

Extended description of function.

Returns

True if succesful, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

Raises

FileNotFoundError – If the Earthdata account details entered are incorrect.

oceanliner_functions.survey_interp(ds, survey_track, survey_indices, sampling_details)

Interpolates dataset ‘ds’ along the survey track given by the sruvey coordinates.

Parameters

  • ds (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset) – MITgcm LLC4320 data for all days

  • survey_track (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset) – lat,lon,dep,time of the survey used for the interpolation

  • survey_indices (xarray.core.dataset.Dataset) – i,j,k coordinates used for the interpolation

  • sampling_details (dict) – Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest.

Returns

all field interpolated onto the track sh_true: ‘true’ steric height along the track

Return type

subsampled_data

Raises

Sampling strategy is invalid – If a sampling strategy is not specified or different from the available strategies - sim_utcd, glider, sim_mooring, wave_glider, saildrone

oceanliner_functions.vis_2D(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, sampling_details)

Creates a 2D visualisation for the interpolated dataset ‘ds’ along the survey track given by the survey coordinates. :param RegionName: It can be selected from WesternMed, ROAM_MIZ, NewCaledonia, NWPacific, BassStrait, RockallTrough, ACC_SMST, MarmaraSea, LabradorSea, CapeBasin :type RegionName: str :param datadir: Directory where input models are stored :type datadir: str :param start_date: Starting date for downloading data :type start_date: datetime :param ndays: Number of days to be downloaded from the start date :type ndays: int :param sampling_details: Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

Returns

None

oceanliner_functions.vis_2D_M(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, sampling_details)

Creates a 2D visualisation for the interpolated dataset ‘ds’ along the survey track given by the survey coordinates. :param RegionName: It can be selected from WesternMed, ROAM_MIZ, NewCaledonia, NWPacific, BassStrait, RockallTrough, ACC_SMST, MarmaraSea, LabradorSea, CapeBasin :type RegionName: str :param datadir: Directory where input models are stored :type datadir: str :param start_date: Starting date for downloading data :type start_date: datetime :param ndays: Number of days to be downloaded from the start date :type ndays: int :param sampling_details: Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

Returns

None

These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

oceanliner_functions.vis_3D_M(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, sampling_details)

Creates a visualisation for the interpolated dataset ‘ds’ along the survey track given by the survey coordinates. :param RegionName: It can be selected from WesternMed, ROAM_MIZ, NewCaledonia, NWPacific, BassStrait, RockallTrough, ACC_SMST, MarmaraSea, LabradorSea, CapeBasin :type RegionName: str :param datadir: Directory where input models are stored :type datadir: str :param start_date: Starting date for downloading data :type start_date: datetime :param ndays: Number of days to be downloaded from the start date :type ndays: int :param sampling_details: Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

Returns

oceanliner_functions.vis_survey(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, sampling_details)

Creates a visualisation for the whole dataset. :param RegionName: It can be selected from WesternMed, ROAM_MIZ, NewCaledonia, NWPacific, BassStrait, RockallTrough, ACC_SMST, MarmaraSea, LabradorSea, CapeBasin :type RegionName: str :param datadir: Directory where input models are stored :type datadir: str :param start_date: Starting date for downloading data :type start_date: datetime :param ndays: Number of days to be downloaded from the start date :type ndays: int :param sampling_details: Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

Returns

None

Raises

FileNotFoundError – If the Earthdata account details entered are incorrect or the path to directory is incorrect.

oceanliner_functions.vis_survey_M(RegionName, datadir, start_date, ndays, sampling_details)

Creates a visualisation for each month between the start and end dates. :param RegionName: It can be selected from WesternMed, ROAM_MIZ, NewCaledonia, NWPacific, BassStrait, RockallTrough, ACC_SMST, MarmaraSea, LabradorSea, CapeBasin :type RegionName: str :param datadir: Directory where input models are stored :type datadir: str :param start_date: Starting date for downloading data :type start_date: datetime :param ndays: Number of days to be downloaded from the start date :type ndays: int :param sampling_details: Includes number of days, waypoints, and depth range, horizontal and vertical platform speed. These can typical (default) or user-specified, in the case where user specfies only some of the details the default values will be used for rest. :type sampling_details: dict

Returns

None

Raises

FileNotFoundError – If the Earthdata account details entered are incorrect or the path to directory is incorrect.

Note*:

Please give start date from the starting of the month.
